official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue $2 bills bearing a design emblematic of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution ion the reverse side.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue $2 bills bearing a design emblematic of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution on the reverse side.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue $2 bills bearing a design emblematic of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution ion the reverse side.
